title: General, Organic and Biochemistry
description: These videos are part of a course series designed for Allied Health Students at Sacramento City College - SCC.  This is not all of the material, it is a simple demonstration site. All of the material is available in the book on the LibreTexts web site.

modules.title: Measuring Matter and Energy
modules.description: This section looks at some important pre-requisite knowledge and how we use measurement in science.

modules.title: Atomic Structure
modules.description: This section looks at how we understand atomic strcuture.

modules.title: Nuclear Chemistry
modules.description: This section explores topics ranging from atomic structures to nuclear medicine.
